thread.title: Dumfries fundraiser 'honoured' to attend Pride of Britain Awards
thread.title_full: Dumfries fundraiser 'honoured' to attend Pride of Britain Awards | Border - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Dumfries fundraiser 'honoured' to attend Pride of Britain Awards
text:
The Pride of Britain Awards. Credit: ITV Border A Dumfries fundraiser says he was honoured to have attended the 2015 Pride of Britain Awards.
The ITV Border region's winner, Michael Pattie, was nominated for raising hundreds of thousands of pounds for the Meningitis Research Foundation.
The full awards programme will be shown on ITV at 8pm this evening.
Last updated Thu 1 Oct 2015 Entertainment Cumbria Scotland Pride of Britain Awards
